title: Leaves from the journal of our life in the Highlands, from 1848 to 1861.
author: Victoria
snippet: We drovethrough Fern Tower (belonging to the widow ofthe first Sir D. Baird), where we stopped the carriage ; then to Abercairny, Major Moray's.

title: The works of Robert Burns: with an account of his life, and criticism on his writings.
author: Burns, Robert
snippet: TUNE—" N. Gow's Lamentation for Abercairny."
